name: Book of Faces
description:
"In his life, a man wears many faces. God forbid he lose his own." - Abelard Tollert.

To reclaim your identity, you sought the book of faces. Now it lies in your hands, and within it's page may be the key to who you are. All that remains is to open it.

A roguelike dice-builder.

This is an entry into Miz Game Jam 1! The theme was to the use the provided asset pack (shown below!)

I don't have a Youtube video, but I do (will have) a blog post here about how I made it and the numerous things that went wrong along the way.

No game breaking bugs found but you never know.

https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1
